content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Munich.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, initially asked for 1,200 Euros per month, and I countered with 900 Euros, which he considered too low. We agreed to discuss further after I had time to reflect, and he suggested a price of 1,050 Euros as a fair compromise. I requested time to consider this offer and compare it with other options before making a decision.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 7.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: As I mentioned, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. However, I did feel that the initial asking price was high for an unfurnished apartment, given my budget as a student. This is a common concern for many students and young professionals in the housing market.
name: Yi-Nuo
